BlogEntry.Title: GeoURL ICBM Address Server
BlogEntry.Description:
Okay, I put information on my page about where my house is so now you can check to see who else has registered and is near me. 

It looks like they don't keep enough precision on the position in their data base so here is a map with my real location.

BlogEntry.Title: Ticking clock
BlogEntry.Description: The clock is ticking.  I have 25 days to write a replacement for Radio.  I'm not going to pay for this POS that doesn't work.

BlogEntry.Title: MichaelW has a weblog
BlogEntry.Description:
Michael says I made him do it.

Well, ChrisAn made me do it.

BTW, Michael, blogger supposedly does let you post via email.  So does Radio, but Radio generally doesn't work for me.

BlogEntry.Title: What was kodak thinking?
BlogEntry.Description:
Check out the sample images from Kodaks (twice delayed) 14 megapixel DSLR, the DSC-14n.

Now check out the samples from the Canon 1Ds.

These pictures are both from the manufacturers served from their websites.  Is Kodak really going to sell any of these things?
